author: donaldp
msg: Removed tabs, unglobbed imports, shuffled code to conform to phases in Avalon (thus no longer requiring caching of ComponentManager/Configuration/Context in some cases).

author: donaldp
msg: Fixed: There is a small bug in the POP3Handler where it doesn't quite follow the standard. A deleted message is allowed to be deleted again.
Also added in some changes of structure to more align with Phoenix model

author: jon
msg: the loop was adding ant-1.2.jar from the jakarta-site2 module which is bad
because we don't want that to be used, we want James' ant.jar file to be
